title: School Shooting, Pimpin' NFL Picks, Tommy Can't Bathe, Kanye West and more.
itunes:title: School Shooting, Pimpin' NFL Picks, Tommy Can't Bathe, Kanye West and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Happy Friday!!! If you have never won a game of bingo then this here show is for you. Steve and Junior have a holiday gift list just for Tommy. OJ Simpson has some advice for Colin Kaepernick. There is another school shooting in Southern California. Tommy smells like hot wet @$$ citrus. Pimpin' glides to us from Ghana where he has on his special coat and gives us his week 11 NFL picks. Tickets are now available to Kanye West's Sunday Service with Joel Olsteen. Today in Closing Remarks, Uncle Steve fondly speaks about his experience in Africa and encourages us to visit, plus more. Y'all have a great weekend! God loves you!!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
